home.me.name: Agustin Vera
home.description: I love solving and programming solutions to give the user the best possible experience
about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! My name is Agustin Vera and I am web developer. I am currently a student of the University Technician in Programming at the UTN (National Technological University). I love learn new skills, tools and concepts.In addition to working on several full stack solo projects, I have worked on several paid projects as a freelancer.
skills.title: What my programming skills included?
skills.description: I started studying web development using tools like Youtube, Udemy, the community and the documentation of the different technologies. My training as a front-end developer has been 100% self-taught.
works.title: Featured Works
work.description0: E-commerce type web aplication for an online clothing store.
work.description3: Landing page for a tourist accommodation house in San Rafael, Mendoza.
work.description2: Practice project carried out following the specifications and user stories raised in devchallenges.io.
work.description4: Fictitious project carried out as a practice which consists of an association of doctors who work online allowing their patients to request shifts and information through the page.
work.description1: Practice project in which predictions of the Qatar 2022 World Cup can be made.
work.description5: Digital menu developed for the restaurant L'obrador.
reviews.title: What customer says

contact.description: Interested in working together? Contact me without commitment. I pay for the coffee.
